Resources Overview

DDPSC Maker resources include educational materials (lesson plans etc., which we are actively working on), and links to useful Maker sites. To see what we’re up to now check out our blog and follow us on twitter.

About

The Maker Group at the Donald Danforth Plant Science Center is a forum for all members of the Center to explore constructing low-cost hardware and software engineering tools.

©2016 Donald Danforth Plant Science Center. All rights reserved
